## About 
 
I am a PhD candidate studying Marine Science at the University of California, Santa Barbara. Working with <a href="https://msi.ucsb.edu/people/faculty/mark-brzezinski">Mark Brzezinski</a> and <a href="https://marine.rutgers.edu/team/kim-thamatrakoln/">Kimberlee Thamatrakoln</a> to relate community biogeochemistry and phytoplankon physiology to 'Omics measurements primarily along the California coast.

***
